RelatedSentence: The Alabama Department of Corrections denied requests by AL.com and WBHM to tour the facility Friday with broadcast media outlets Fox 6 WBRC and Alabama News Network .

According to a report from Fox 6 reporter Beth Shelburne , Tutwiler remains horribly overcrowded , but she noticed some improvements , such as 300 newly installed cameras and privacy curtains in the showers .
